data.name: boostorg/throw_exception
data.readme:
throw_exception
===============

Common infrastructure for throwing exceptions

versions.manifest:
targets = [ "//:throw-exception" ]

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-config"
version = "branch=master"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-detail"
version = "branch=master"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-exception"
version = "branch=master"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-utility"
version = "branch=master"

versions.buck:
load('//:subdir_glob.bzl', 'subdir_glob')
load('//:buckaroo_macros.bzl', 'buckaroo_deps')

prebuilt_cxx_library(
  name = 'throw-exception',
  header_only = True,
  header_namespace = 'boost',
  exported_headers = subdir_glob([
    ('include/boost', '**/*.hpp'),
  ]),
  deps = buckaroo_deps(),
  visibility = [
    'PUBLIC',
  ],
)
